name: SpaceBlaster 2
description:
Details Added: 

Reskinned all AI and Player Sprites

Changed Background for battle in different locations

Placed Camera to locked to give a more arcade style game feel

Created different skins for enemies to illustrate bosses vs normal enemies

Added Planets, Comets and other Environmental hazards

Altered the projectile color to be more visible across the map

Increased size of player and enemies to make it easier on the player

Added a level 3 being the final level
